title: Really nice
text: Small restaurant, in a perfect location. They have terrace upstairs where it is a great place to have a meal. The food is really tasty, with a nice presentation and uncommon tastes. Highly recommended.

title: Interesting
text: Located far from the center, however it is a nice church surrounded by a nice park outside. The church itself is small, but beautiful inside. The guide is unfortunately only available in bulgarian. Recommended to visit the nearby waterfall the same day.

title: Best option in the main street
text: The place is perfectly decorated, a retro style but with a nicely good taste. The food offer is huge, and the three times I've visited it, every option is really tasty. Highly recommended for Sofia.

title: A retro experience
text: The restaurant is cozy, well decorated and the food offered is high quality. It also provides a private and retro experience. A good option if you are around.

title: Really tasty food
text: The restaurant offers a lot of Indian dishes. The food is great, especially I recommend to try the rice. A perfect Indian experience in Sofia.

title: Great option
text:
The place is well located, there is a big parking for cars outside and the rooms are really clean, including a nice terrace outside.

The beds are very comfortable. The breakfast actually could be better, however, in general, it is a great option to stay in the city.

title: Nice food
text: The place is perfectly located, there's a big parking and the food is tasty. The staff is polite and in general it is a good option for Kazanlak.

title: Interesting
text: It is a nice place, however if you're archeologist or historian will be much more interesting. Even though it is a copy (the original one is closed to public), it perfectly reflects the old style painting.

title: Beautiful place
text: The best attraction in Elena. It is a beautiful area with traditional houses where the visitor will experience the authentic and typical Bulgaria. Recommend to visit it in autumn. If you are in Elena, do not miss it.

title: Nice place for a coffee
text: I decided to take a coffee here before continuing my visit. It offers a good service in a beautiful traditional place. Anyway, it is the only place I found. Recommended.

title: Very nice experience
text:
It is difficult to find if you arrive at night. The place is beautiful, big, and the room, as well as clean, is really authentic.

There is a tavern where it is possible to have dinner. It is also a traditional Bulgarian breakfast included.

However, they don't accept card payment and it can be a big disadvantage.

title: Very tasty food
text: The place is located in the very city center, and the tavern is very nice. The food was absolutely tasty and the stuff polite. Very good option.

title: Very typical place
text: The place is hard to find, especially if you arrive at night, however it is really worth. The house is an old one, decorated with traditional items that makes the experience really authentic. Hardly recommended.

title: Very good
text: A perfect place for a retirement. It is a beautiful monastery, well preserved, and there is the chance to book rooms for sleeping. One of the best religious places I have visited in Bulgaria.

title: Confortable
text: The place is perfectly located, and the beds are really confortable. The stuff was polite and helpful. However, the breakfast could actually be better, very simple. Anyway it is a good option for Troyan.

title: One of the best of Bulgaria
text: The cave is relatively small, however it is impressive how the nature can create such a wonder. It takes around 20 minutes from Lovech. The entrance costs 3 leva but it is worth.

title: Great food
text: It is an old Bulgarian house turned into a beautiful and nice restaurant. It is quite big, with lot of tables both outside and inside. The food is really tasty. The stuff is polite and the prices are quite ok. Hardly recommended for Troyan.

title: Dinner and fado
text: The food is tasty, and it is perfectly located. There is a fado show that is really interesting and turns the experience in a more authentic one.

title: Very nice experience
text: The food is tasty, and it is perfectly located. If the weather is good, it is possible to enjoy the meal outside in th square. Recommended.

title: Great!
text: The place is perfectly located, and it is possible to see the process of production. It is really interesting! Highly recommended to stop for a while and check. The pastéis are really tasty.

title: Imposing
text: Every great square needs to have a statue. This one looks at the river from its privilege position. Interesting.

title: Really nice
text: The square is beautiful, with a fountain and the theater on its side. It is interesting to see the floor that remembers to the waves in the sea.

title: Tasty food
text: I entered here to try the famous "pastel de nata". It was tasty. The place is perfectly located and the old atmosphere inside makes it interesting.

title: Interesting
text: It is a big sculpture representing the Portuguese explorers. It is located in the riverside and has a perfect view to the big "25th April" bridge.

title: Interesting
text: This is the real origin of the typical cake "pastéis de nata". There is usually a big queue, however, it is worth because the pies are very tasty. It is very close to "monastery of jerónimos", so, perfect for a break after the visit.

title: Essential
text: This place is well restored, perfectly preserved, and amazingly beautiful. The visitor will not forget it, specially the cloister.

title: Mandatory visit
text: This square, built to restore the old town after the earthquake in 1755, is the symbol of the city. It is quite open area and it is full of terraces, restaurants and also includes the tourist information office.

title: Typical central Street
text: It is always nice to walk in this kind of streets. Full of shops, bars and restaurants. It directly leads to the big square and the Tajo River. Impossible to visit Lisbon and not come here.

title: Don't use it.
text: It costs 5.3 euro for a 30 seconds ride. Do not use it. This is not worth. Better to use the stairs.

title: Beautiful place
text: Even though it is not the most beautiful castle I've visited, it is interesting to spend some time. The views of the city are amazing and the surrounding neighborhood is really authentic.

title: Tasty food
text: Just arrived in Portugal, I decided to try this restaurant as it was really close to my accomodation. The food (i ordered rice with duck) is very tasty and the location is perfect. Recommended.

title: Great
text: This is the biggest canal in the city, however it is not the most beautiful in my opinion. It is always crowded with boats offering a ride for tourists. A great place.

title: Nice for a walk
text: It is a small area, located in the very centre, but the garden is nice. The visitor will definitely cross this place during the visit to Aveiro.

title: Recommended
text: This is the very place to try the typical local sweet, Ovos Moles. It is a small place, but I recommend a visitor to try.

title: Beautiful area
text: I came from Porto to spend just the afternoon, and I really liked the place and its atmosphere. The canals are undoubtedly the best part. However, one day is enough for a visit.

title: Nothing really special
text: Located 5 minutes walking from yh city center, it is not the best attraction in town, but is still the cathedral. At night, the view from outside is better.

title: Excellent view, food improvable
text: The place is located in a perfect place, in a canal, and the view is simply great. However, the food could be better. The croquettes were tasteless.in addition, they didn't have tuna (quite strange in a restaurant in a coastal city). Could have been much better.

title: Beautiful park
text: The park is small, but very beautiful. It is a pleasure to walk here, however, when I arrived it was already getting dark. Recommended to visit it in Aveiro.

title: Nice
text: It is a new train station, where everything is clear, and it is easy to guess the trains. It takes about 10-15 minutes walking to the centre.

title: Perfect for a day
text: The place is located just 1.30 h from Porto by train. It is worth to visit for a day trip or just the afternoon. The houses look so authentic and it is very pleasant to walk around the neighborhood.

title: Tasty ice cream
text: The place is small, however the location is perfect, just in the old town, and the icecream is tasty. I recommend it.
place: Gelateria Italiana Fabio Lupi L'arte del Gelato Naturale

title: Very good
text:
It is actually a small train station, however, there is an information and ticket office in the hall.

I recommend you to buy tickets here in order to avoid long waiting times in queues.

title: Magical place
text:
It is a place full of mysticism and magic. Maybe the templarian cross on the ground has something to be with it.

I was lucky to cross it almost alone, and you feel much more the energy this place transmits.

This is definitely one of the places that really touched me. If you visit Sintra, try to go at the end of the day, when there are less people, so that you have a more complete experience.

title: Very pleasant for a walk
text: The city center is not big, however, the narrow streets are perfect for a walk. Sintra is a city full of charm and I recommend to visit the city center, if you can.

title: Surprising
text:
Honestly, I did not know anything in advance about this place but the famous staircase.

The area is simply amazing, perfect to get lost, full of small paths that actually can lead the visitor everywhere.

The staircase is the most interesting in my opinion. As the visitor goes down, there's a feeling to access in a completely new world. It is really a magic place.

The entrance is 10, however it is worth the effort. This was my favourite attraction in Sintra.

title: Great!
text:
Located in the top of a hill, the views are astonishing, where it is possible to see both the ocean and the bridge 25th April in Lisbon.

Built in the middle ages, it is well preserved, maybe a little bit dangerous to walk, but the effort is worth. The most impressive part is the wall, and see hot it looks directly to the sky.

title: Simply amazing
text: Every monarchy has or had their summer palace. This is the building used by the Portuguese kings for that purpose. It is built in the top of the mountains, and the views are simply spectacular. The mix of colours and different arts makes it a unique attraction. You didn't visit Sintra if you didn't come here.
place: Park and National Palace of Pena

title: Nice place for a drink
text: I decided to stop here and have a drink before my dinner. It has a nice terrace outside and the stuff is really polite.

title: Perfect for cod
text: There are only cod dishes in this restaurant. The food has high quality, and the stuff is really polite and helpful. Perfect place to eat in Sintra.

title: Authentic neighborhood
text: This is an essential part to visit in Lisbon. Just walking in the streets can make the traveler feel in a real Portuguese atmosphere.

title: Tiny beach
text: It is nice to find a beach in the city center. Its reduced size and atmosphere make it perfect for relaxing.

title: Beautiful town
text: Just 40 minutes by train from Lisbon, there is this beautiful town, perfect for all kind of travellers. It is very pleasant to walk in the pedestrian streets, as well as visiting the beaches. Essential for a trip to Lisbon

title: Nice food.
text: The location is perfect, just in the main pedestrian street. The food is really tasty and the bread portions are quite big. In addition, the guests will drink in a metal typical glass. If you want to try Indian food in Cascais, this is definitely your place.

title: Interesting
text: There's an interesting legend behind this place and why was given its name. Located 30 minutes walking from the city center, it is worth to visit. However, according to the locals, it is better when there is strong swell.

title: Great food
text: The atmosphere of this restaurant is so authentic and quite bohemian. The food is presented in an uncommon way, however it is very tasty. The stuff is very polite and they invite the guests for limoncello at the end. A very interesting option for Cascais.

title: Tasty food
text: The location is perfect, the stuff is really polite, and the fish is fresh and really tasty. Recommended.

title: Perfect for everyone
text: It is the best place in the city for walking, especially when the weather is good. It is perfect for all kind of visitors. If you are in Burgas, do not miss it!

title: Beautiful
text: The only restaurant in the island, however, they have a lot of variety in food. The stuff is nice and the views to the sea are simply amazing. Recommended to try.

title: Interesting option
text: Located not in the very beach, however, it offers quite a lot of fish. They produce their own beer and this is always a plus. Interesting.
